original_title: Camilo Pessanha: Entre os Dois Abismos
overview: Biographical program on Camilo Pessanha, a poet associated with the movement of symbolism in the Portuguese language, led by Danilo Barreiros, writer and researcher, highlighting his stay in Macao and the influence that Chinese culture and art had on his work.
title: Camilo Pessanha: Entre os Dois Abismos
